metadata.name: Suspicious DLL Loaded via CertOC.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects when a user installs certificates by using CertOC.exe to load the target DLL file.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\certoc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('certoc.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -loaddll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /loaddll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –loaddll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —loaddll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―loaddll '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\downloads\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\windows\\tasks\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\windows\\temp\\'))))

output.summary: Detects when a user installs certificates by using CertOC.exe to load the target DLL file.
